text: (Aey Muhammad), us din se tum inhein darao jabke azaab inhein aa lega us waqt yeh zaalim kahenge ke “aey hamare Rubb, humein thodi si mohlat aur de de, hum teri dawat ko labbaik kahenge aur Rasoolon ki paiwari karenge”. (Magar unhein saaf jawab de diya jayega ke) kya tum wahi log nahin ho jo issey pehle kasamein kha kha kar kehte thay ke humpar to kabhi zawaal (decline) aana hi nahin hai
